title: Interpretation of a dream about burning a child’s hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about burning a child’s hand in a dream. Would you like to know whether the dream interpretation is about burning a child’s hand in a dream? We present in the following lines what scholars mentioned, not personal judgments. Interpretation of a dream about burning a child’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about burning a child’s hand in a dream. A fire in a child’s hand could indicate bad things, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees himself burning a child’s hand in a dream, this may indicate his shortcomings in the rights of his children, and God I know the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child’s hand being burned in a dream, he can express judgments, and God knows best. If a young man sees in a dream a child’s hand being burned, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a fire without fire in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a fire without fire in a dream could be An indication of the actions that must be paid attention to, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a fire in a dream without fire, this may indicate the bad behavior he is performing and he must return, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a fire in a dream without fire in the house, it may be a sign of... Constant problems with her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding in a dream can be a sign of judgments, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, seeing fire coming out of a marriage can be a sign that you will be free from problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see The fire is extinguished in marriage, then this may represent liberation from evil, God willing. If a married man sees himself extinguishing the fire in marriage in a dream, this may indicate good changes, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about lighting a fire in an oven in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a fire in an oven can be in A dream is a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a fire burning in the oven, this may lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a fire in the oven, this may be a sign that he is going through a difficult time, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a fire in the oven in a dream, this may indicate There is a problem, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of burning half of the face in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of burning half of the face in a dream could be a sign of hypocrisy, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees half of his face burning in a dream, this may lead to injustice, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees half of his face burning, This may indicate injustice to others, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees half of her face burning, this may be a sign of hypocrisy and she must repent, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone burning in front of me in a dream. I know that seeing someone burning in front of me may mean anxiety, and God knows best. Also, seeing someone burning could indicate committing sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees someone burning in a dream, this may be a sign of a prominent position, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about burning tea in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing old friends in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, we present to you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing old friends in a dream. Friendship is one of the most beautiful human relationships that God Almighty created among His servants. Days occupy every person's life. Days and years can separate friends, so their relationship does not become what it was before. Sometimes a person sees in his dream his friends who he knew previously, and he wakes up confused and he does not know if this vision shows anything. It carries a message to return calling. His friends and he meets them again, but this dream is just a dream with no explanation. We will learn all of this through the following lines in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing old friends in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpretation researcher Ibn Sirin says that seeing childhood friends in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s desire to Returning to the past with its beautiful memories and unforgettable days. This vision also shows that its owner wants to return to his old personality and return to the days of play and fun and escape from the worries and problems of responsibilities. Whoever sees his old friends in his dream, this means that in reality he feels upset, anxious and depressed, but He has the ability to get rid of all these negative feelings. If one sees in his dream his old friend, who looks handsome and elegant, and smiling in the dream, then the vision warns him that happy events will occur in the coming period. Seeing a man sitting with his old partner and talking to him and being very happy indicates However, the dreamer longs for the past and is ready to do anything to bring those days back again. One of the auspicious dreams for a single girl is to dream about her old friends. The dream of a divorced woman sitting with her old friend and feeling her happiness is good news for her that she will do well in the coming period. Interpretation of a vision Old friends of a married woman: If a married woman sees her childhood friends in her dream, then her dream shows her devotion to her husband and her love for him. The dream of a married woman sitting with her old friend whom she loved indicates the dreamer’s desire to return to her childhood. Whoever sees in his dream his childhood friend sitting next to him and not speaking, This means that he suffers from many worries, but they will leave. Old friends in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s dream of her old friends indicates that she will be saved from the troubles of pregnancy, but if she dreams of her friends at school, the vision will be good news for her and abundant food that she will receive. Whoever saw it In her dream, she had an old friend and she ate with him, but she was worried and sad, so this means that the dreamer is anxious and worried about her giving birth. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream that she is sitting with her old friend, this vision is a sign that she misses the past and wishes to return again to rest. Interpretation of seeing school friends in a dream. School friends in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer feels lonely in his life. This vision may indicate that the dreamer misses his friends and the days that brought them together. Another interpretation of this vision is that the dreamer always cooperates with others and has feelings of love for everyone he meets. A dream about school friends is news. It pleased its owner that

title: Secrets of interpreting time in a dream in different situations, good and bad

preview.html: Today we learn about the interpretation of time in a dream, as many people see dreams related to time in their sleep and the person wakes up from sleep without knowing the interpretation that this dream shows and whether it is a promising dream or a warning to him, because time in life is the component of the basic principle of human life, which is the balance that It passes and cannot be recovered again, and through the following article on the encyclopedia website we present to you what is the interpretation of dreams that scholars said about the meanings of these visions and dreams, so follow us. Interpretation of time in a dream The meaning of time in a dream varies according to the time of the vision’s appearance, as follows: Whoever sees the dawn In his dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer will enter a new beginning for things related to his life, and it may indicate that he is going through some problems and that these problems are at an end. Strong will. Whoever dreams in the morning in a dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer needs to pay attention to the issues of his life and pay attention to them, and it can indicate that the dreamer is thinking about something and that this issue is taking over a lot. His attention.The meaning of time in a dreamLunch time in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is standing in the middle of something in his life and that he is thinking about the best way to complete this matter and feels very confused about the way to achieve his goal.Whoever sees in his dream the time of sunset or entering the night, then this dream It symbolizes that there are problems in the dreamer's life that he must solve or that there are people that he needs to get rid of because they are hurting him. And stress. If the dream was at night, then this dream shows that the dreamer needs to rethink the things he is preoccupied with and needs to reorganize his life and get rid of unnecessary things or those that cause him harm and pain. Interpretation of a dream about minutes in a dream: When a person dreams of a specific time in a dream, this dream indicates a specific date that interests the dreamer and occupies his mind. For example, seeing the time is 11:08, this dream indicates that he is busy with a specific appointment. The date, which may be the eighth day of November or the eleventh day of August. Interpretation of ten o’clock in a dream: The number 10 in a dream is considered one of the auspicious numbers and varies depending on who sees the vision as follows: For an unmarried girl who sees ten o’clock in a dream, this dream indicates that God Almighty will provide her with a good husband with whom she will live a happy and fulfilling life, soon, God willing. Seeing a divorced or widowed woman in a dream at ten o’clock in a dream is considered a promising vision because it indicates that God Almighty will compensate her with a good husband with whom she will forget her worries and pains that she has suffered in recent years. Of her life. One of the good visions is for a person to see her in his sleep at ten o’clock, because this dream indicates that God Almighty will grant him much goodness and understanding, God willing. And for a married woman whom God has not blessed with children, to see at ten o’clock in a dream means that God Almighty will give her of Himself. The good offspring that satisfies her and her husband. Interpretation of the seventh hour in a dream: When you see the seventh hour in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about worms falling out of hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about worms falling out of hair. We will learn about the interpretations and whether they are good dreams from bad, so let us learn in detail all the interpretations that talk about worms coming out of the body. Interpretation of a dream about a worm falling out of her hair in a dream: Seeing worms coming out of a man’s hair is a sign of increasing fears and problems. A married woman dreams of a worm Coming out of her hair, it is a sign of a lot of money on her way. When a girl sees worms coming out of her hair, this is a sign of her upcoming marriage. Whoever sees in a dream that worms are coming out of his hair in large quantities, this is a sign of many debts and problems in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a worm Emerging from the body in a dream: Seeing a worm emerging from the stomach is a sign of a bad condition. Seeing a worm emerging from his body is evidence that his children are exploiting him. Dreaming of a worm emerging from the body and the presence of a wound in the body is a sign that he will be exposed to punishments from God Almighty. Whoever sees in his dream that A worm coming out of his stomach and body is evidence of his separation from God Almighty and that he repents and returns. Worms coming out of the teeth in a dream. Whoever sees a worm coming out of his teeth in his dream is a sign that you are surrounded by deceitful people. Dreaming of a worm coming out of one’s teeth is a sign of the interest and interest of those close to him. When you see worms coming out of the teeth, this is a sign that the person is suffering from symptoms of the disease and needs to repent. Whoever dreams that worms are coming out of his teeth, this is a sign of his distance from God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a worm coming out of his body. Anyone who dreams of a worm coming out of a corpse is a sign of... Many crises and problems. You dream of a worm emerging from death, a sign of misfortunes and problems that happen to people. When you see worms spreading on the grave of a dead person and emerging from his body, this is evidence of the sins and transgressions he committed. Dreaming of a worm emerging from death is one of the very bad dreams that indicate To distance oneself from God Almighty. Interpretation of a worm coming out of the stool in a dream: Seeing a worm coming out of the stool is a sign of many grandchildren. When you see worms coming out of the stool, this is a sign of the end of the problems and crises that you were facing. Dreaming of worms coming out of the stool is a sign of victory. On enemies. Whoever sees that he expels a worm in his feces, this is evidence of the abundance of good offspring that he secretes. Interpretation of a dream about a white worm emerging from the bay: Seeing white worms emerging from the vagina of a married woman is a sign of many marital problems. A man’s dream is that there are many white worms They come out of his private organs, and this is evidence of the abundance of livelihood that he will obtain. When you see white worms coming out of the vagina, this is a sign that childbirth is imminent. Whoever sees in his dream that a white worm is coming out of his side, this is a sign of the approaching marriage of an immoral person. Interpretation of a dream Worms on the roof of the house: Seeing worms coming out of the roof of the house is a sign of marital discord. Whoever sees that he is leaving his house and the roof of his house without it, this is a sign of disagreement and strife between him and those around him. Dreaming of worms in the house is a sign of strife between brothers.

title: Interpretation of drowning in a dream

preview.html: If there is death by drowning, it reminds us of the dream of abandoning sins and returning to Almighty God. Through the website gptafser.com/, we will talk about the interpretation of drowning in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of drowning in a dream for a single girl. Seeing her drowning in a dream means an unmarried girl in the sea, if she is a seeker of knowledge. She was able to escape from drowning. Fidel stated that she was able to succeed after she failed in her studies. Seeing drowning in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her connection to a person with the failure of the relationship between them. This drowning may indicate the suffering that this girl will face because of a new job that she will join. And the emergence of some problems in her. Drowning in a dream may mean that this girl is committing a sin in reality. This is a warning for her to stay away from this sin to escape from it. If this girl has a desire to be attached to a specific person and feels dissatisfied with him when she thinks about it. Seeing this indicates To end this relationship once it fails. Seeing a girl drowning with someone she does not know and not showing her anger and pain. This vision shows that she will marry that person and live a decent life with him and feel joy and happiness. If an unmarried girl sees herself drowning in clear water, this indicates her relationship with someone It will make her happy and comfort her. The unmarried woman saw that she fell into the sea and caught a fish and was happy about that. She fearlessly came out of the sea, which indicates that a lot of food awaits her soon. If an unmarried girl drowned in her dream and looked to her brother to save her from drowning. It shows The extent of the bond between them and their standing next to each other. See also: Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning in Silt. Interpretation of seeing drowning in a dream for a married woman. Perhaps a married woman who drowned in her dream shows her lack of interest and neglect of her family. Seeing repeated drowning in a dream for a married woman may indicate the extent of suffering and distress. With her husband because she wants to divorce him because of his bad morals. Also, a married woman drowning in her dream indicates that she is suffering from great pressure during this time and that she thinks a lot about these pressures. A married woman drowning in a dream may mean that she is seeking to leave her home and her husband unjustly. If A married woman dreamed that one of her sons was drowning, so she was trying to save him. This indicates the son’s survival and superiority in solving all the problems he faces, God willing. Interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees himself drowning in a dream and he owes a debt, it will be heavy on him, It will be difficult to control it and it will not be possible to repay it. But if he sees himself drowned in a dream by someone with money and influence, this will affect wealth and livelihood. If a married man dreams of a room in front of his wife, this means that he is drowning in lust. And the scandals that he hides About his wife and discovers her because of the scandal or his death. Read also: Interpretation of surviving drowning in a dream for a divorced woman. The meaning of seeing a pregnant woman drowning in a dream and its interpretation. To see a pregnant woman drowning in a dream, this may indicate the many pains she suffers during pregnancy. For a pregnant woman to see in a dream that she is Watt

Read also: Interpretation of surviving drowning in a dream for a divorced woman. The meaning of seeing a pregnant woman drowning in a dream and its interpretation. To see a pregnant woman drowning in a dream, this may indicate the many pains she suffers during pregnancy. For a pregnant woman to see in a dream that she is Watt

title: What is the interpretation of seeing planes in the sky in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing airplanes in the sky in a dream carries with it many interpretations that herald all goodness, blessings, and livelihood. Travel has many benefits in reality, the most important of which is moving to another country in the shortest time, and it is one of the wonders of the twentieth century. It is one of the happy visions that express a new beginning full of successes and joy, but it also indicates exposure to some problems. Interpretation of seeing planes in the sky in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing planes in the sky in a dream? There are many interpretations and connotations for this vision, some of which are good and herald goodness, while others warn. Of painful events, and its interpretation depends on the type and size of the aircraft and its number. If they are many and large in size, this is an indication of the nearness of achieving the important goal for which the fortuneteller was working and making a strenuous effort to achieve. It is also considered a good person to obtain a big promotion or obtain a prestigious job, Which will bring a more prosperous and prosperous life in the coming days. While the plane is full of smoke, this indicates the beginning of a successful project or a successful new step in life that will have a great impact in the future (God willing). The large number of planes flying directly above the dreamer’s head also expresses About the good reputation and preferred position that the dreamer enjoys in the hearts of those close to him, whether his friends or family. As for the kites, they indicate the presence of people surrounding the dreamer who carry false and unreal feelings, wearing the garb of sincerity that hides deception and cunning behind them. Helicopters also symbolize making great efforts. Of effort, exhaustion, and struggle to achieve the goals and objectives that the dreamer wants. While seeing the plane in the distance, it is evidence of the dreamer’s connection to the impossible or illusions that are difficult to achieve or reach. If it is close, it means that he is on a date with the fulfillment of a cherished desire, for which he worked hard And he will succeed in the near future. The person who sees airplanes and controls them is a sign that he is on the right path and knows the steps that must be followed to achieve his goals. Interpretation of seeing airplanes in the sky in a dream for a single woman. Most interpreters agree that this vision expresses the beginning of a new step in The dreamer’s emotional life, such as her engagement, marriage, or meeting the right dream boy. If there are many military or war planes, this indicates her marriage to the person she loves and will bring her a happy married life full of stability and comfort. As for the kites, they represent a relationship with an unrelated person. His feelings are fake. He pretends to love her while in reality he is deceiving her and pursuing personal goals. If the person she loves is on one of the planes that she is flying, this indicates separation or distance, either due to disagreements or travel and separation. While helicopters are seen as a message for her to care With her abilities and skills that she loves and not listening to the words of those around her who try to discourage her and undermine her resolve. As for seeing many planes flying...

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person being alive, the interpretation of a dream about seeing my dead father alive, and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person being alive and talking.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the dead: There are many dreams and visions that a person encounters on a daily basis during his sleep, and he can see that the dead person is still alive and talks to him or shares food and drink with him. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive. Interpretation of a dream about the dead by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about the living dead? It can be considered an interpretation The dream of seeing a dead person alive is that it carries some meanings that pertain to the non-dead dreamer himself, that is, it can express the bliss that exists in him or vice versa, and the matter depends on the actions he did in this world and the form in which he appeared to the forerunner. If the dreamer meets that he died in his dream Then he came back to life, and commentators say that he committed some sins, but he went to repentance and will soon get rid of them, God willing. If a dead father sees a son in a dream and asks him to do some good things, then he must follow them, and if he is asked to stop some actions, then he must avoid them. As much as possible because that will harm him and harm God. He knows better. It can be said that a dead person laughing in a dream, who smiles a lot in insight, is considered to be in a good and high position with God as a result of the good he did in his life. It is possible to see the deceased dreamer hitting a living person in the dream, and it is clear from this that this person caused Losing part of his religion during his life. Concerning the conversation between the deceased and the dreamer, it is one of the sincere sayings that we must focus on so that the person may gain many benefits thanks to it and avoid evil. Dream interpreters tell us that greeting the dead and hugging him can bring a lot of sustenance to the person, especially from places Which he did not think about, and that the matter bodes well for the dreamer’s long life, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive, Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive is a sign of knowing the dreamer’s love for that person and his desire to meet him again, and thus He finds her in his dream. More than others and therefore this dream brought up the subconscious. A person may lose someone close to him and be very sad and the deceased appears to him telling him that he is alive and not dead. Interpreters show that this dream confirms his great position with his Lord and the forgiveness that he enjoys. I got. And she received it. Talking with the deceased can be an expression of love and serious absence, and we must focus on the details of the conversation and notice certain things that bring the dreamer happiness and success. If a girl finds that her deceased mother came in a dream and she is angry about some of her actions, then she may be involved in some bad deeds and commit Sins, and from here the vision becomes a warning for what you are doing. Ibn Sirin confirms that if a dead person asks for food for the living, then he is in dire need of sincere supplication for him, and God knows best. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person Live for singles. Experts say that if an unmarried woman hears the voice of a dead person in a dream and he was near her before his death and she did not see him, then she should ask for mercy and pray for him. If she finds that one of the dead is talking to her and taking her with him to an unknown and empty place, then experts

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing dirty dishes: Seeing washing dishes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing washing utensils in a dream indicates happiness, an increase in money, and other meanings, which we will show to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, such as washing dishes with soap and water in the kitchen for a son. Sirin and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of washing dishes in a dream. Washing dishes and utensils in a dream and cleaning them is good news for the dreamer. Washing dishes for girls and women indicates solving problems and is said to be the fulfillment of a desire in the event that the dreamer is happy when he finishes washing and washing or is happy with the liquidation. In the vision. Arranging dishes and utensils during or after washing indicates happy days and the life that the dreamer desires. If the fortuneteller participates in the washing, then goodness is shared by both parties, whether it is money, benefit, love, or good relationships. The presence of dirty dishes in the dream indicates To fears and problems, but the dreamer who washes them indicates the end of these worries and the solution of all problems. The presence of a large amount of dishes or utensils in your dream indicates the arrival of great happiness for the dreamer, especially if the dream ends with her cleaning the dishes, which means that her marriage will be successful, God willing. Dreaming about washing dishes means that you are making an effort to improve your life and it may mean that you will get rid of something that was holding you back. In other cases, dreaming about washing dishes could symbolize your feeling that your effort in life is not getting you anywhere and that you have to work hard just to fulfill your basic responsibilities. And stay in the same place. As always. Dreaming about washing dishes can symbolize a situation in which you feel endlessly busy but achieving nothing lasting. Dreaming about washing your dishes may symbolize a situation in which you have to take responsibility for the physical consequences of your actions. Dreaming about washing dishes can also indicate cleanliness And purity, and this dream can indicate that you have forgotten something, especially if there is something in your life that you feel guilty about. Your dream of washing dishes may symbolize that you are trying to clean and improve your life. Interpretation of washing dishes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin says that the dream In which a person washes dirty dishes can indicate divination and the collection of large sums of money, but it can also often mean problems and troubles. But in general, washing dishes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will improve the bad situation in which he lives, and fix something and strive to achieve the best. For married people, seeing you washing dishes indicates that there are unresolved problems. And if you see that the dishes are sparkling, this means that everything is working in the best way. Washing dishes in a dream for an unmarried person or an unmarried girl indicates Having a problem that must be solved immediately and that you should tell a member of your family about your concerns to help them solve your problems. Seeing dirty dishes piled in the sink means that you will not be able to find a common language with those who do not usually understand you. And washing dishes means that you are deceived by an illusion, and these The vision shows order in the home and harmony in family relationships, especially

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing gold in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream in its entirety, in different ways, as it appears in the form of money, coins, or bullion, and gold appears in a dream completely according to the condition of the one who dreams of it, and today through our website, in my experience, you will learn about many of the conditions of a golden dream.Interpretation The dream of gold in a dream for a single woman is very good if it is jewelry or bracelets, but if it is made of alloy, then it is long, and if the unmarried woman wears a gold ring in the dream, then it is complete. This indicates that her wish will come true if the ring contains gemstones. This indicates the girl’s engagement and gifting her this ring. As for the gold bracelets in an unmarried woman’s dream, they are better for her... if the bracelets are for men. This shows sadness and anxiety, even if just one girl sees that someone is giving her a lot of gold. This indicates that the girl will face problems because the abundance of gold indicates that she will be tempted. Seeing gold in a dream is complete for a married woman. If it is in the form of a ring, then it is good. However, if the gold ring is from her husband, then she will have a son. However, if the vision is a bracelet, and if she has daughters, then this indicates On a lot. Good food and money. Seeing a full gold ring in a dreamIf a pregnant woman sees a full gold ring in a dream, this means that she will give good news to a male child, which is similar to a golden earring for a pregnant woman, it means her death from fatigue. A man sees full gold in a dream, this is not good, But if a man wears gold, this is good for the man and predicts promotion. If a man sees a golden ring, this indicates that if the man takes off the ring, this indicates a divorce between the man and his wife, but if the golden ring has a gold bracelet, it indicates peace and he will be happy with the news of his happiness. If you dream that you are getting a gold ring, it is said that he will obtain a prestigious and ranked position in his work and professional life, but if he sees that the ring has some inscriptions on it, this indicates that his desires and ambitions will be fulfilled.

title: Interpretation of a dream about urine by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing urine in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man who urinates a child’s urine on the bed or on the clothes. I dreamed that I was urinating on myself and cleaning up the yellow urine of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Usaimi. More interpretations: The dream of urine in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that many people dream of. Where there may be urine in a dream, it is one of the common dreams and many dreams spread around the world, and urine in a dream symbolizes a loss of self-control. Or that you have to stop thinking about one of the new topics. Also, dreaming of urine in a dream shows the financial benefits that will come to you, and urinating in a dream has different forms, including seeing your own urine, seeing the urine of others, or you can see a lot of urine on the ground, and others, which we will explain to you. Every situation. Interpretation of urine in a dream (seeing urine). Whoever sees that he has urinated in a place, it is a condition that it be in his place, so he will be relieved of worry and anxiety. Whoever sees that he urinated in a mosque, then saved his money, or a son came and he is an imam for the people, then if someone urinates on him, it means that he spent his money on him. Interpretation of urine in a dream by Ibn Sirin If you see your urine in a dream, this means that you will lose control of your thinking about some of your problems and you must Rethink it because it will help you change your life for the better. If you see urine spread everywhere, this means that you fear losing responsibility, money, and financial concerns in the near future. This is also related to feeling bad towards others, and during pregnancy this is a sign of trying to get rid of Negative situations in your daily life. Urine in a dream also indicates the presence of great wealth and good financial luck in your life or unexpected benefits. Excreting urine in a dream means that you spend a lot, and if you see your underwear wet, it means that there are social problems and you should stay away from... Any controversy. Urine in a dream for a married person indicates the arrival of a child. Interpretation of urine in a dream by Nabulsi: If an unmarried man sees urine in an unknown and unfamiliar place, this indicates that he will marry a woman from the same place. Seeing urination in a dream indicates the creation of food, but In the event of constipation and difficulty urinating, this indicates urgency and inappropriate behavior. If you dream that you are urinating in a well, this means that you will spend money from legitimate gains. If you see him urinating on a commodity, this indicates the loss of the commodity. And seeing that he is urinating on one or more urine from His urine indicates relief if he is poor, and if he is rich he loses his money. If you see that you are urinating juice, then you are spending money. Seeing yourself urinating in mud or dirt is evidence of a man not performing ablution. Dreaming of washing in the sea in a dream indicates that money will come out of him to Al-Hakim. Interpretation of urine in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing blood in urine in a dream means that a sick child will be born to him. Seeing urination in a dream when people allow some of his urine, it means that she will give birth to a good child and people will pray for him. Seeing urine on clothes in a dream indicates That the
